Key Match Events: Charith Asalanka dismissed Arshdeep Singh L.B.W. with an off break length ball.
Charith Asalanka dismissed Shivam Dube L.B.W. with an off break length ball.
Shivam Dube hit a four off Charith Asalanka's off break length ball.
Wanindu Hasaranga's appeal for L.B.W. against Mohammed Siraj was made but not successful.
Mohammed Siraj scored 2 runs off Wanindu Hasaranga's leg spinner length ball.
Shivam Dube hit a six off Wanindu Hasaranga's leg spinner length ball.
